sensor_network

Class Position

  • java.lang.Object
    • sensor_network.Position
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.PositionI, java.io.Serializable

    public class Position
extends java.lang.Object
implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.PositionI
    This class represents a position in a two-dimensional space. It implements the PositionI interface.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
